title: Understanding Boundaries
text: Boundaries are essential in maintaining healthy relationships. They help individuals define their personal space and comfort levels.

title: Why are boundaries important?
text: Boundaries help protect individuals from being overwhelmed or taken advantage of in relationships.

hintAnswer: limits people set to define their levels of comfort when interacting with others
title: Defining Boundaries
text: What is the definition of boundaries in the context of relationships?
choices: limits people set to define their levels of comfort when interacting with others
